name: notesnook
tagline: A self-hosted sync server for encrypted notes
description: Notesnook sync server provides secure, self-hosted synchronization support for Notesnook clients. It handles encrypted note syncing, device registration, and user accounts without third-party servers.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Synchronize notes across devices with end-to-end encryption for privacy

features.title: User Management
features.description: Handle authentication and user management for Notesnook clients

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Sync notes between Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, and Android apps

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own sync server for complete control over note data

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Export encrypted backups for disaster recovery and data portability
